song.englishname: As We Sail to Heaven's Shore

english.segment1: Storms may rise on seas unknown. While we journey towards our home. Surely we'll learn what grace if for. As we sail to heaven's shore
english.segment2: Send us strength O pilgrim guide. Sin would drown us in its tide. Be close at hand and go before. As we sail to heaven's shore
english.segment3: Holy Spirit lead us on. Give us courage bring the song
english.segment4: Lord we trust Your Father's care. Will convey us safely there. Open or seal off every door. As we sail to heaven's shore
english.segment5: Straighten our course with every prayer. Let heaven's breezes speed us there. And grant us mercy evermore. As we sail to heaven's shore
english.segment6: Draw us near O finest Friend. From dawn's light to evening's end. Each passing day we love You more. As we sail to heaven's shore. As we sail to heaven's shore
